definitions.text: compliant and obedient to authority; -G. B. Shaw
examples: editors and journalists who express opinions in print that are opposed to the interests of the rich are dismissed and replaced by subservient ones

definitions.text: serving or acting as a means or aid
abjectly submissive; characteristic of a slave or servant; ; - S.H.Adams
examples: slavish devotion to her job ruled her life
a slavish yes-man to the party bosses
she has become submissive and subservient
